text: Code of the West is an American 2012 documentary film directed by Rebecca Richman Cohen about the 2010 campaign to repeal Montana's legalization of medical marijuana. ==References== ==Further reading== * ==External links== * * Category:2010s documentary film stubs Category:2012 films Category:American documentary films about cannabis Category:American films Category:Cannabis in Montana Category:Cannabis prohibition Category:Documentary films about cannabis Category:Documentary films about Montana
title: Code of the West (2012 film)
